message.content:
I need to identify the total income (revenue) and its constituent line items from the income statement.

Looking at the statement, I can see:
- "Total Revenue" with a value of 863371.65
- This consists of "Main Business Revenue" which is also 863371.65

In the example provided, "Total Revenue" is identified as the total income arising from ordinary activities.

Since "Main Business Revenue" is the only constituent of "Total Revenue" (they have the same value), it's the only sub-item to be included.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '863371.65', 'sub_items': {'sub_item value': '863371.65'}}}
```
